promotions.name: Weekend Grand Buffet
promotions.label: New
promotions.description: Featuring mouthwatering combinations with a choice of five different salads, six enticing appetizers, six main entrees and five choicest desserts. Free flowing bubbly and soft drinks. All for just $19.99 per person.

leaders.name: David Nguyen
leaders.description: David Nguyen leads our hotel with a deep understanding of guest needs and operational excellence. With over 15 years in hotel management, he ensures every guest enjoys a seamless and memorable stay.

leaders.name: Sophia Lee
leaders.description: Sophia Lee oversees guest relations, ensuring personalized service and exceeding guest expectations. With a background in hospitality management, she ensures our guests feel welcomed and valued throughout their stay.

leaders.name: Michael Johnson
leaders.description: Michael Johnson is our Executive Chef, known for his culinary creativity and dedication to using local ingredients. He crafts menus that showcase the regionâ€™s flavors, offering guests a delightful dining experience.

leaders.name: Emily Wang
leaders.description: Emily Wang oversees daily operations, ensuring efficient and smooth functioning across all departments. With a focus on quality and service excellence, she ensures our hotel operations run seamlessly.
